backend/main.mo: Actor handling user profile storage with access control checks and a public sitemap URL.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend files and components.
frontend/.ic-assets.json: Asset configuration defining caching rules and headers for deployment.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_CHECKLIST.md: Detailed deployment verification checklist to prevent build and hosting issues.
frontend/DOMAIN_SETUP.md: Guide for configuring custom domains, DNS, redirects, and SSL for the site.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styles defining OKLCH color tokens and dark mode variables.
frontend/index.html: Source HTML entry with SEO metadata, structured data, and dev script reference.
frontend/public/_headers: Custom headers configuration for static assets including content types.
frontend/public/_redirects: Redirect rules enabling SPA routing and static file passthrough.
frontend/public/404.html: SPA fallback page redirecting unknown routes to root except static assets.
frontend/public/robots.txt: Robots.txt allowing all crawlers and pointing to sitemap.
frontend/public/sitemap.xml: XML sitemap listing the homepage with metadata.
frontend/src/admin/components/ProfileSet: Empty admin profile setup modal file.
frontend/src/admin/pages/AboutEditorPage: Empty admin about editor page file.
frontend/src/admin/pages/ContactEditorPa: Empty admin contact editor page file.
frontend/src/admin/pages/CoursesManagerP: Empty admin courses manager page file.
frontend/src/admin/pages/FacultyManagerP: Empty admin faculty manager page file.
frontend/src/admin/pages/LayoutSectionsP: Empty admin layout sections page file.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app initializing diagnostics, SEO guards, and rendering HomePage inside an error boundary.
frontend/src/components/About.tsx: Renders the About section using marketingSiteContent, displaying paragraphs and a feature card.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: Implements a React error boundary that logs errors and shows a fallback component on failure.
frontend/src/components/Contact.tsx: Displays contact info with phone, email, WhatsApp actions and styled cards.
frontend/src/components/Courses.tsx: Shows a grid of course cards with features and an extra info section from marketingSiteContent.
frontend/src/components/DomainSetupDialo: Empty component file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/DownloadWebsiteC: Provides a button that triggers download of a ZIP file containing website code.
frontend/src/components/Faculty.tsx: Renders faculty cards with photos, roles, experience, and specialization details.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Builds the site footer with about text, quick links, contact details, and social icons.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Creates a responsive header with scroll behavior, navigation, mobile menu, and download button.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Renders the main hero section with background, heading, CTA buttons, and stats using marketing content.
frontend/src/components/RuntimeErrorFall: Displays an error fallback card with reload and home navigation options.
frontend/src/components/WhatsAppButton.t: Floating button that opens a WhatsApp chat using the configured phone number.
frontend/src/content/marketingSiteConten: Centralized content configuration for site branding, hero, about, faculty, and courses.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, reinitializing on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendActorSafe.t: Creates a backend actor with safer optional admin token initialization and basic error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication context, identity loading, login, and logout using Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Hooks for fetching and saving the caller's user profile using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup with custom brand colors, theming, animations, and scrollbar styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry that sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and renders the main app.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Composes the homepage layout with header, hero, sections, footer, and WhatsApp button.
frontend/src/static-export/renderStaticS: Generates a static HTML page using marketing content and HTML escaping utilities, producing full markup for all site sections.
frontend/src/static-export/staticExportA: Defines a list of image assets to include in the static export, mapping source paths to output destinations.
frontend/src/static-export/zipWriter.ts: Provides a simple in-memory ZIP file writer placeholder that tracks files and returns an empty ZIP buffer.
Empty placeholder file for future content serialization utilities.
frontend/src/utils/runtimeDiagnostics.ts: Implements runtime diagnostics including error logging, promise rejection tracking, and optional render logging.
frontend/src/utils/seoGuards.ts: Enforces SEO rules by managing canonical URLs, noindex tags, and domain checks to control indexing behavior.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters, including hashâ€‘based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with custom colors, typography, animations, and container settings.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Vite configuration that adds a static export plugin to generate HTML, CSS, JS, copy assets, and produce a ZIP archive post-build.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, state version, feature requests, and existing architecture notes.
